title: Can We Improve the ASA Submission Process? (Brian McCabe)
dc:creator: Queens Podcast Lab
description: Joe, Leslie, Gabriel, and Brian McCabe (Georgetown University) discuss complaints about the ASA's submission process for its annual meeting, and whether it could be improved.
